column5: Pending sale of my current boat, I am the proud owner of a new Smokercraft 182 Promag.  150 Merc 4 stroke, 80 lb Terrova with ipilot, 597 ci console, 587 ci bow, full top and mooring cover.  If you know of anyone intetested in a 16 ft Alimacraft with a 40 hp, tell them to check kijiji Hamilton.  Thanks to all who gave me advice on the boat purchase!
Sounds great don't forget to post some pics when you get it wet
Nice!! congrats! yes we're are the pics
Yeah ... would love to see some pics of that rig.  Congrats on teh new ride.
